event.title: amounted to nine fishermen and their families in 1790

data.event: The population amounted to nine fishermen and their families in 1790.

event.title: the construction of a harbour and dock in 1791

data.event: Charles Rashleigh who moved to Duporth Manor, just outside the village, used plans prepared by John Smeaton to begin the construction of a harbour and dock in 1791.
The first dock gates were completed in 1799.
